name: Mom took my DS and I want to play Pokemon
name_original: Mom took my DS and I want to play Pokemon
description:
You play as a girl whose name isn't important, but what is important is her quest.

You see, this girl is in a predicament, she wants to play Pokemon but her mother has taken her DS away from her, as it's a school night.

This girl doesn't care about grades, she only cares about catching pokemon.

Becareful not to wake up your mom..

Created by me and my lovely girlfriend!
